snippet: Jersey Moves! features nearly a dozen dance companies and will be at NJPAC in Newark on March 24 and 25, while Dance Fest, hosting four companies, runs March 24 through April 1 in Hackettstown.
abstract: Jersey Moves! dance festival will spotlight 11 prominent dance companies during two-day run in March at the New Jersey Performing Arts Center in Newark; Dance Fest, also taking place in March, will feature four New Jersey dance companies performing at the Centenary Stage Company in Hackettstown (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: Jersey Moves! features nearly a dozen dance companies and will be at NJPAC in Newark on March 24 and 25, while Dance Fest, hosting four companies, runs March 24 through April 1 in Hackettstown.

headline.seo: Jersey Moves! and Dance Fest to Showcase New Jersey’s Dancers
